<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2821</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The instruction Game -student activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Anweisung Spiel - Kursteilnehmeraktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le jeu d'instruction - activité d'étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O jogo da instrução - atividade do estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il gioco di istruzione - attività dell'allievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιχνίδι οδηγίας - δραστηριότητα σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El juego de la instrucción - actividad del 
estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment of a game activity where students are required to understand and carry out instructions in order to play a game.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">instructions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung 
einer Spielaktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer benoetigt werden, 
Anweisungen zu verstehen und durchzuführen, um ein Spiel zu spielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation 
d'une activité de jeu où des étudiants sont requis de comprendre et
effectuer des instructions afin de jouer un jeu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação 
de uma atividade do jogo onde os estudantes sejam requeridos 
compreender e realizar instruções a fim jogar um jogo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione di
un'attività del gioco dove gli allievi sono tenuti a capire ed 
effettuare le istruzioni per giocare un gioco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση μιας 
δραστηριότητας παιχνιδιών όπου οι σπουδαστές πρέπει για να 
καταλάβουν και να πραγματοποιήσουν τις οδηγίες προκειμένου να 
παιχτεί ένα παιχνίδι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen de
una actividad del juego donde requieren a los estudiantes entender y 
realizar instrucciones para jugar un juego.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
